plays.text: Penalty to Gary Suter 2 minutes for Crosschecking Denis Pederson
Penalty to Andrei Nazarov 2 minutes for High Sticking Gary Suter
Goal scored by Daymond Langkow assisted by Shane Doan and Denis Pederson
Penalty to Paul Mara 2 minutes for Holding Bryan Marchment
Penalty to Niklas Sundstrom 2 minutes for Roughing Paul Mara
Penalty to Paul Mara 2 minutes for Roughing Niklas Sundstrom

Penalty to Brad Stuart 2 minutes for Tripping Landon Wilson
Goal scored by Daniel Briere assisted by Drake Berehowsky and Sean Burke
Penalty to Vincent Damphousse 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Denis Pederson
Penalty to Ossi Vaananen 2 minutes for Slashing Owen Nolan
Goal scored by Marco Sturm assisted by Patrick Marleau and Teemu Selanne
Goal scored by Shane Doan assisted by Denis Pederson and Todd Simpson
Penalty to Marcus Ragnarsson 2 minutes for Slashing Ladislav Nagy
Penalty to Landon Wilson 2 minutes for Tripping Bryan Marchment
